descriptionHtml:
This is a REPLACER for the original.

Not much to say, I decided to add a bit to the bow that shipped with Skyrim. Personally I found the vanilla bow to be lacking and always wanted it to have more glass parts. Well I finally learned how to edit bow's and this is the result. :) 

Update*1

Added support for Vvardenfell Glass Armor and Weapon set by [b]Bingles - Emieri00 - PlanetSlayer. [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41848/?][b]Vvardenfell Glass[/b][/url]
[b]
[/b]Update*2

Fixed issue where bow was un-droppable. Sorry everyone.           

Tools used:

Blender 2.49b
NifSkope 2 pre alpha

Permission:

As long as it stays on the Nexus and you give credit, feel free to use this in your mods.
author: Scroll Thief

files.name: Glass Battle Bow for Vvardenfell Glass
